encyclopedia.content: 歌手信息 Colbie Caillat出生成长于加州马里布，父亲Ken Caillat正是民谣摇滚奇乐团Fleetwood Mac写下辉煌销售成绩经典大作 《Rumours》、《Tusk》的幕后制作推手﹔11岁时，节奏蓝调女伶Lauryn Hill红透半边天的<Killing Me Softly>让她开始向往成为歌手，不过她的父亲告诫她能够拥有动人的歌喉虽然美好，但是在音乐界真正受人推崇的往往是词曲创作者，于是Colbie决定往全方位音乐人目标迈进。孩提时代接受过古典钢琴训练的

entry.tran: 兴奋的；活泼的；爱说话的
entry.def: Someone who is bubbly is very lively and cheerful and talks a lot.

example.ex: a bubbly girl who loves to laugh
She had a bright and bubbly personality.
Guests were presented with glasses of bubbly on arrival.
example.tran: 客人来后，都有香槟酒招待。

entry.def: If something is bubbly, it has a lot of bubbles in it.

example.ex: Melt the butter over a medium-low heat. When it is melted and bubbly, put in the flour.
example.tran: 用中低火把黄油加热，等黄油熔化起泡时，加入面粉。

means.word_mean: 1. a white sparkling wine either produced in Champagne or resembling that produced there
1. emitting or filled with bubbles as from carbonation or fermentation;
2. full of or showing high spirits;
